title: Darley-city. Waiton`s alternative
annotation:
Ivies is a family in which all topics of life were perceived with great attention, but Alex, having matured and becoming a photographer, decided them himself, otherwise everything would have looked absurd. 
Jack Waiton is a true friend, and just had to make the right move....
